content:
Apologies if this isn't the right place to ping @docwilmot , but I'm wondering about the status of my PR 23 days ago, https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/profile/pull/6. Is it missing anything? Should it be reviewed by others? Anything I can do to help it along?

Upgrade from profile2 by bugfolder 路 Pull Request #6 路 backdrop-contrib/profile
This PR responds to this issue: #5 It adds a hook_update_N() implementation that migrates any existing Profile2 profiles into this module and cleans up the db and config directory. It also adds som...
@bugfolder I could take a look at it today. @docwilmot ported the module but didn't put himself as maintainer so someone like you could volunteer to maintain it.

I'm tempted, but there's a lot going on in the module that I don't fully understand, which gives me pause. (I do understand the parts that I wrote the PR for. I hope.) Getting some other eyes on it would be great, so, thanks in advance!

bugfolder said:

I'm tempted, but there's a lot going on in the module that I don't fully understand, which gives me pause...

I have that feeling with most/all of the modules I am a maintainer on. :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes: And is why I tend to put "co-maintainers wanted" in the README.

@bugfolder don't worry. I maintain some modules too where I don't understand everything. From your PR I'm confident you've got the skillset to learn what you need if anything breaks. Or ask the community for help
